00192     /* Sick LD sensor modes of operation */
00193     static const uint8_t SICK_SENSOR_MODE_IDLE = 0x01;                                  
00194     static const uint8_t SICK_SENSOR_MODE_ROTATE = 0x02;                                
00195     static const uint8_t SICK_SENSOR_MODE_MEASURE = 0x03;                               
00196     static const uint8_t SICK_SENSOR_MODE_ERROR = 0x04;                                 
00197     static const uint8_t SICK_SENSOR_MODE_UNKNOWN = 0xFF;

00199     /* Sick LD motor modes */
00200     static const uint8_t SICK_MOTOR_MODE_OK = 0x00;                                     
00201     static const uint8_t SICK_MOTOR_MODE_SPIN_TOO_HIGH = 0x09;                          
00202     static const uint8_t SICK_MOTOR_MODE_SPIN_TOO_LOW = 0x04;                           
00203     static const uint8_t SICK_MOTOR_MODE_ERROR = 0x0B;                                  
00204     static const uint8_t SICK_MOTOR_MODE_UNKNOWN = 0xFF;

00206     /* Sick LD service codes */

00210     static const uint8_t SICK_WORK_SERV_CODE = 0x04;

00215     /* Sick LD status services (service code 0x01) */

00224     static const uint8_t SICK_STAT_SERV_GET_ID_SENSOR_NAME = 0x01;                      
00225     static const uint8_t SICK_STAT_SERV_GET_ID_SENSOR_VERSION = 0x02;                   
00226     static const uint8_t SICK_STAT_SERV_GET_ID_SENSOR_SERIAL_NUM = 0x03;

00235     /* Sick LD configuration services (service code 0x02) */

00243     static const uint8_t SICK_CONF_SERV_GET_FUNCTION = 0x0B;

00245     /* Sick LD configuration filter codes */

00247   
00248     /* Sick LD nearfield suppression configuration codes */
00249     static const uint8_t SICK_CONF_SERV_SET_FILTER_NEARFIELD_OFF = 0x00;

00251   
00252     /* Sick LD measurement services (service code 0x03) */

00256     /* Sick LD working services (service code 0x04) */

00279     static const uint8_t SICK_ROUT_SERV_COM_DATA = 0x05;                                
00280 
00281     /* Sick LD file services (service code 0x07) */

00299     static const uint8_t SICK_CONF_SECTOR_NO_MEASUREMENT = 0x01;

00303 
00304     /* Sick LD profile formats */
00305     static const uint16_t SICK_SCAN_PROFILE_RANGE = 0x39FF;                             
00306     /*
00307      * SICK_SCAN_PROFILE_RANGE format (0x39FF) interpretation: 
00308      * (See page 32 of telegram listing for fieldname definitions)
00309      *
00310      * Field Name   | Send
00311      * --------------------
00312      * PROFILESENT  | YES
00313      * PROFILECOUNT | YES
00314      * LAYERNUM     | YES
00315      * SECTORNUM    | YES
00316      * DIRSTEP      | YES
00317      * POINTNUM     | YES
00318      * TSTART       | YES
00319      * STARTDIR     | YES
00320      * DISTANCE-n   | YES
00321      * DIRECTION-n  | NO
00322      * ECHO-n       | NO
00323      * TEND         | YES
00324      * ENDDIR       | YES
00325      * SENSTAT      | YES
00326      */
00327 
00328     /* Sick LD profile formats */
00329     static const uint16_t SICK_SCAN_PROFILE_RANGE_AND_ECHO = 0x3DFF;                    
00330     /*
00331      * SICK_SCAN_PROFILE_RANGE format (0x3DFF) interpretation: 
00332      * (See page 32 of telegram listing for fieldname definitions)
00333      *
00334      * Field Name   | Send
00335      * --------------------
00336      * PROFILESENT  | YES
00337      * PROFILECOUNT | YES
00338      * LAYERNUM     | YES
00339      * SECTORNUM    | YES
00340      * DIRSTEP      | YES
00341      * POINTNUM     | YES
00342      * TSTART       | YES
00343      * STARTDIR     | YES
00344      * DISTANCE-n   | YES
00345      * DIRECTION-n  | NO
00346      * ECHO-n       | YES
00347      * TEND         | YES
00348      * ENDDIR       | YES
00349      * SENSTAT      | YES
00350      */
00351   
00352     /* Masks for working with the Sick LD signals
00353      *
00354      * NOTE: Although the Sick LD manual defines the flag
00355      *       values for red and green LEDs the operation
00356      *       of these LEDs are reserved. So they can't
00357      *       be set by the device driver.
00358      */
00359     static const uint8_t SICK_SIGNAL_LED_YELLOW_A = 0x01;                               
00360     static const uint8_t SICK_SIGNAL_LED_YELLOW_B = 0x02;                               
00361     static const uint8_t SICK_SIGNAL_LED_GREEN = 0x04;                                  
00362     static const uint8_t SICK_SIGNAL_LED_RED = 0x08;                                    
00363     static const uint8_t SICK_SIGNAL_SWITCH_0 = 0x10;                                   
00364     static const uint8_t SICK_SIGNAL_SWITCH_1 = 0x20;                                   
00365     static const uint8_t SICK_SIGNAL_SWITCH_2 = 0x40;                                   
00366     static const uint8_t SICK_SIGNAL_SWITCH_3 = 0x80;
